title: Fix: CSV export truncates long text fields
body:
## Bug Report

### Description
When exporting data to CSV, text fields longer than 1000 characters are being silently truncated. This is causing data loss for users who export and then re-import their data.

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Create a record with a description field > 1000 characters
2. Export to CSV
3. Open CSV in text editor
4. Notice the field is truncated at exactly 1000 chars

### Expected Behavior
Full text content should be preserved in CSV export.

### Actual Behavior
Text is truncated at 1000 characters with no warning.

### Environment
- Python 3.11
- pandas 2.0.3
- Our export module: src/export/csv_exporter.py

### Possible Root Cause
I suspect there's a hardcoded limit somewhere in the CSV writer configuration.
